description:
Headquarters tracks Fine`s base to an abandoned hospital outside town.  When the Symphogear wielders attack the base, their powers are weakened by a strange red gas, and they are attacked by a monster which doesn`t seem to be a Noise...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shuuen o Nozomu Mono, Shuuen ni Nozomu Mono
Those Who Long for the End, Those Who Challenge the End
終焉を望む者, 終焉に臨む者
